member.name: T:DG.DemiLib.DeColorPalette
member.summary: Stores a color palette, which can be passed to default DeGUI layouts when calling DeGUI.BeginGUI, and changed at any time by calling DeGUI.ChangePalette. You can inherit from this class to create custom color palettes with more color options.

member.name: T:DG.DemiLib.DeSkinColor
member.summary: Contains both free and pro skins color variations, and automatically returns the correct one when converted to Color
